original_text: This Moses whom they refused, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush.
korean_text: 그들의 말이 누가 너를 관리와 재판장으로 세웠느냐 하며 거절하던 그 모세를 하나님은 가시나무 떨기 가운데서 보이던 천사의 손으로 관리와 속량하는 자로서 보내셨으니

sentences.original_text: saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge?
sentences.korean_translation: saying, 누가 너를 통치자와 재판관으로 삼았느냐고 말하며

sentences.original_text: to be a ruler and a deliverer
by the hand of the angel
which appeared to him in the bush.
